original_title: ROH: Death Before Dishonor XIX Zero Hour
overview: Death Before Dishonor 2022 (Death Before Dishonor XIX) is a professional wrestling pay-per-view produced by American promotion Ring of Honor (ROH). It took place on July 23, 2022, at the Tsongas Center in Lowell, Massachusetts. It is the nineteenth event in the Death Before Dishonor chronology. It is also ROH's first live event under the ownership of All Elite Wrestling (AEW) president Tony Khan.
title: ROH: Death Before Dishonor XIX Zero Hour
